current.title: Закладка
current.desc: of all things, the lyrics to Zakladka are my favourite part of the whole. taking into account the band's name really completes the picture, haha

current.title: I Could
current.desc: lazy sort of tune, very fun to sing (much like a lot of the favourites these days). shame it ain't a longer track
current.scrolltext: i could, come on to your place, babe

current.title: Courtship Dating
current.desc: i know, Crystal Castles? 2008 is calling and they want their bangers back, but i got that electronic itch so they can wait their turn
current.scrolltext: then they roll their cardboard eyes their skin, will ne-ver age

current.title: Mary's Theme
current.desc: couldn't for the life of me find the person on vocals, but thanks to a fan-made music video think i found her, shoutout Sandra Ann Lauer

current.link: <iframe src='https://www.youtube.com/embed/8klo-6wjzhs?si=FtBjioL5y6Q6Uyw1' title='YouTube video player' frameborder='0' allow='accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share' referrerpolicy='strict-origin-when-cross-origin' allowfullscreen></iframe>
current.title: Dynamic
current.desc: the song loops around itself like a circular staircase and is consistent in a similar kind of way, despite oscillating from foggy to heavy and back again. above all i find it satisfying
current.scrolltext: head in the sky feet on the ground, dynamic thoughts, spinning around

current.title: Pseudoshine
current.desc: i want this song injected. you hear me? a syringe with the full concentrated musical mass of this song straight into my neck, and pronto

current.title: Make Me A Better Man
current.desc: would you believe me if it told you it took me several listens to figure out he's singing about a lesbian
current.scrolltext:
now i'm in a place that i've never seen, with someone i have never been, it might make me a better man but you'll never know

'

current.title: Concrete
current.desc: couldn't for the life of me find the person on vocals, but thanks to a fan-made music video think i found her, shoutout Sandra Ann Lauer
current.scrolltext: harder then your head, baby, harder than the concrete

current.link: <iframe src='https://www.youtube.com/embed/xa9miuDiuDs?si=O4xdQCmwEcWSLK1F' title='YouTube video player' frameborder='0' allow='accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share' referrerpolicy='strict-origin-when-cross-origin' allowfullscreen></iframe>
current.title: Love Story - 2024 Remastered Version
current.desc: can't believe it's only two minutes long. one of the warmest tracks out there on guitar. you were a genius, Levy

current.title: I Want an Earth
current.desc: i don't know what it is about this track but it's very Minecraft, very Moog City by C418, but also very distinct and not that at all. i find it pleasing

twentyfour.title: Soundcheck
twentyfour.desc: this is just the intro to an album but it seems i listened to it on loop so many times it made it to nr1 on my most listened. i vaguely recall falling asleep to it once
twentyfour.scrolltext: instrumental

twentyfour.title: The Hamlet
twentyfour.desc: sometimes video game OSTs are perfect. this is an example of one such song, a reprieve from despair in an otherwise doomed world. i listened to it much more then a sane person should, mostly on the bus of all places
twentyfour.scrolltext: instrumental

twentyfour.link: <iframe src='https://www.youtube.com/embed/3Ainj43dqUY?si=FdDOwtllnDcGbuMr' title='YouTube video player' frameborder='0' allow='accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share' referrerpolicy='strict-origin-when-cross-origin' allowfullscreen></iframe>
twentyfour.title: I Gotta Right To Sing The Blues - Take 2
twentyfour.desc: this is not my favourite Billie Holiday song, but nevertheless it is the one i have listened to most. it lifts your spirits on a bad day and on a good one it keeps them high, despite the lament in the lyrics
twentyfour.scrolltext: it must be love, say what you choose, / i gotta right to sing the blues

twentyfour.title: Got The World At Your Fangs
twentyfour.desc: as i often say, Frog are terrible and they are my favourite band. this is my favourite song of theirs. i cried to it for months
twentyfour.scrolltext: my hands, through your bangs / got the world at your fangs

twentyfour.title: Flook
twentyfour.desc: dreamy yugo pop that follows you down a railway tunnel
twentyfour.scrolltext: they all come and go

twentyfour.title: Cracking
twentyfour.desc: short, calm track, in the irreplicable style of Crumb. the album is also fantastic, i recommend
twentyfour.scrolltext: how you keep yourself from cracking it's not easy need to practice

twentyfour.title: Bline
twentyfour.desc: quite different to their previous work but still with the excellent lyricism. and i like when a bassline growls at me, what can i say
twentyfour.scrolltext: the wind's hand strikes my face / sharp, bitter blows

twentyfour.title: Can't Help Myself
twentyfour.desc: sweet little tune. for me, it is a depiction of the astonishment that accompanies falling in love
twentyfour.scrolltext: oh, oh i can't help myself / something comes over me

twentyfour.title: Nothing You Can Say
twentyfour.desc: thrashes in a way i really appreciate. besides, whole first verse is fire and nobody can tell me otherwise
twentyfour.scrolltext: nothing that you could say / i don't already know

twentyfour.title: Linoleum
twentyfour.desc: became kind of obsessed with this song when i first heard it, and am still kind of obsessed almost two years later. trophy wife picks at something stuck in the corner in my head
twentyfour.scrolltext: i like the linoleum / floor of your apartment / and when we argue i like the sound / as it bounces around

twentyfour.title: Swallowed My Key
twentyfour.desc: calm, typical Vada Vada tune. love the 'ringtone' segment
twentyfour.scrolltext: just me and myself and i swallowed my key just to lock the door

twentyfour.link: <iframe src='https://www.youtube.com/embed/R0I2KhBUJww?si=VPMq0PxBHDBGTDrz&controls=0' title='YouTube video player' frameborder='0' allow='accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share' referrerpolicy='strict-origin-when-cross-origin' allowfullscreen></iframe>
twentyfour.title: In the Shadow of the Valley
twentyfour.desc: this cowboy-ass tune is one of my favourite songs of all time. sing it at my funeral
twentyfour.scrolltext: a little bit further i will find my rest / in the shadow of the valley / that i love best

twentyfour.link: <iframe src='https://www.youtube.com/embed/sSvPRyx2fIU?si=-ul0WbVvgQgRVZ7a' title='YouTube video player' frameborder='0' allow='accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share' referrerpolicy='strict-origin-when-cross-origin' allowfullscreen></iframe>
twentyfour.title: cyanide
twentyfour.desc: excellent song for evading pedestrians while skating at speed down a main street
twentyfour.scrolltext: she tastes like cyanide, i think she's dead inside

twentyfour.link: <iframe src='https://www.youtube.com/embed/XmzFqA7i2FY?si=Hm5Xfzw3RYr_2gKO' title='YouTube video player' frameborder='0' allow='accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share' referrerpolicy='strict-origin-when-cross-origin' allowfullscreen></iframe>
twentyfour.title: Let Us Make You Money
twentyfour.desc: a song beginning with a creature disguised as a woman coming to the narrators door and ending with their death has no right to go this hard
twentyfour.scrolltext: a familiar face came to open the door / her smile was diamonds and her eyes were black mold

twentyfour.link: <iframe src='https://www.youtube.com/embed/wQ7OIpVgN8s?si=fjD9VpCbYnIe4Rm2' title='YouTube video player' frameborder='0' allow='accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share' referrerpolicy='strict-origin-when-cross-origin' allowfullscreen></iframe>
twentyfour.title: Sexy to Someone
twentyfour.desc: couldn't have said it better. outrageous that it's coming from Clairo, though
twentyfour.scrolltext: sexy to somebody, it would help me out / oh, i need a reason to get out of the house

twentyfour.title: Hold Me Lovingly (A Fantasy)
twentyfour.desc: of all things i will say Starberry is great at expressions of pain. like Frida Kahlo
twentyfour.scrolltext: come to me / hold me lovingly / painful scenes / painting memories

twentyfour.title: Knife Fight
twentyfour.desc: yet more beautiful vocals buffetted by the sound of a band lashing their instruments into giving out emotion from Trophy Wife
twentyfour.scrolltext: and i bring myself to a knife fight / only to find you waiting with a sword / and i'll let you spill my guts / i just hope this is love

twentyfour.title: On Fye
twentyfour.desc: the ten seconds of guitar after the first verse has me in its clutches
twentyfour.scrolltext: i'm on fire, for the first time / i'm on fire, it's been a long time

twentyfour.link: <iframe src='https://www.youtube.com/embed/gb_zQXF3_WM?si=QWeIFUIOYhqHZKNR' title='YouTube video player' frameborder='0' allow='accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share' referrerpolicy='strict-origin-when-cross-origin' allowfullscreen></iframe>
twentyfour.title: Cannock Chase
twentyfour.desc: yet another of my favourite songs of all time. singing it makes me happy. Labi Siffre is a genius
twentyfour.scrolltext: sitting in the back seat of my car / with my arms around my guitar

twentyfour.title: Touch
twentyfour.desc: a song in the typical Frog fashion, which is to say an invitation to a feeling and moment recounted with painfull earnestness
twentyfour.scrolltext: don't say too much, don't talk, just touch / don't fuck this up, go slow, don't rush

twentyfour.title: Tomorrow
twentyfour.desc: i love how fast Tomorrow starts, and then slides into a groove and keeps going. it carries you away like a river
twentyfour.scrolltext: i've slept the day away / but tomorrow is entitled / to all good things you find in yourself

twentyfour.title: In the Yard
twentyfour.desc: i've always had a crystal clear image in my head when listening to this. i may paint it one day
twentyfour.scrolltext: when it rains it pours i'm told, i see it dripping from the hole / in the ceiling to the cup below, i should let the landlord know

twentyfour.title: around around around
twentyfour.desc: heavy, and like its title suggests, cycling through itself
twentyfour.scrolltext: around, around, around, around, around

twentyfour.title: Notice of Foreclosure
twentyfour.desc: something about it reminds me of a Soyuz track, just in the wrong language
twentyfour.scrolltext: forced adaptation, notice of foreclosure / dragging us forward, an indifferent future

twentyfour.link: <iframe src='https://www.youtube.com/embed/SWrKklkbC-A?si=BGVRI_D7ZCkY2IyY' title='YouTube video player' frameborder='0' allow='accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share' referrerpolicy='strict-origin-when-cross-origin' allowfullscreen></iframe>
twentyfour.title: Orange
twentyfour.desc: terribly slept on band, though i wish i could make out the lyrics more of the time
twentyfour.scrolltext: hard to say / harder to believe

twentyfour.title: DOOM SONG
twentyfour.desc: exactly what it says on the tin
twentyfour.scrolltext: you should sing, as in a dream / stop the show, break a string

twentyfour.title: Absentee
twentyfour.desc: no idea how i came across this song. the saxophone warbles like a kettle
twentyfour.scrolltext: part of me / abstentee

twentyfour.title: Medieval
twentyfour.desc: think about 'em all the time. rest in peace guys
twentyfour.scrolltext: this could be / a memory / of mine, of mine

twentyfour.title: Ages Ago
twentyfour.desc: something about this song was geared hyper-specificaly to a moment in time i experienced once and it hasn't let go of me since'
twentyfour.scrolltext: i remember you said, ages ago / 'if you love me now, you gotta let me know'

twentyfour.link: <iframe src='https://www.youtube.com/embed/LDslNhTo-Fw?si=jyTFoT9B_L0Q_8IZ' title='YouTube video player' frameborder='0' allow='accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share' referrerpolicy='strict-origin-when-cross-origin' allowfullscreen></iframe>
twentyfour.title: When You Dream
twentyfour.desc: another band i've been waiting on fully blowing up, love this track to death
twentyfour.scrolltext: 'nother little taste / never really hurt no one / when you dream / do you wake up numb

twentyfour.title: Send Her Back
twentyfour.desc: yet another cinematic banger from The Archer, spent a few hours listening to it on loop to work on a painting based on it
twentyfour.scrolltext: Why don't you send her back where she came from?

twentyfour.title: Waters of March
twentyfour.desc: as the self-professed number 1 fan of Antônio Carlos Jobim, this is a wonderful rendition of the song
twentyfour.scrolltext: and the riverbank talks of the Waters of March / it's the promise of life, it's the joy in your heart

twentyfour.title: Really Something
twentyfour.desc: gachan tends to sing in english, so it's a treat when he breaks into bosnian'
twentyfour.scrolltext: i got this one thing / something for nothing / it's really something oh sweet nothing

twentyfour.link: <iframe src='https://www.youtube.com/embed/Zalq90lhnyI?si=ADKt82vKOkhHY75S' title='YouTube video player' frameborder='0' allow='accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share' referrerpolicy='strict-origin-when-cross-origin' allowfullscreen></iframe>
twentyfour.title: Don't Waste
twentyfour.desc: would saw my arm off to hear this live
twentyfour.scrolltext: don't waste you time on me / don't wanna see you / going about my days / don't wanna be you

twentyfour.title: Cold Room
twentyfour.desc: desperately wish they had more than two songs. the build up in this one is perfect
twentyfour.scrolltext: prove to me that you can do more than panic

twentyfour.title: Andromeda
twentyfour.desc: i listen Andromeda at least once a week. i still remember when i first found Titanic Rising, looking at the album cover in0between confusion and awe (is this a photo? how did they do that?). blessedly, the music within was just as good
twentyfour.scrolltext: andromeda's a big, wide open galaxy / nothing in it for me except a heart that's lazy

twentyfour.title: Marionette
twentyfour.desc: unsettling but not cold, if that makes sense
twentyfour.scrolltext: let it take over / let it take over / pull at my strings / marionette holder

twentyfour.title: Untitled '91
twentyfour.desc: title track and in my opinion the best one on the album
twentyfour.scrolltext: 'it's a stick up, don't make it a murder' / the junkie said to get further / took my money, took my boots / new kid, never knew

twentyfour.title: Red with Love
twentyfour.desc: better listened to as a part of the whole that is 'Death of a Cheerleader', in my opinion
twentyfour.scrolltext: it makes me sweat / you're in my head / it turns me red with love

twentyfour.title: Black Friday
twentyfour.desc: dooooooooooo you wanna get a driiiink with meeee
twentyfour.scrolltext: on a black friday you never noticed the stars / take it back, Sade, you turn her on in the car

twentyfour.link: <iframe src='https://www.youtube.com/embed/Nn5TWy1XGGI?si=DGMpUZ3NKuNtQSCW' title='YouTube video player' frameborder='0' allow='accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share' referrerpolicy='strict-origin-when-cross-origin' allowfullscreen></iframe>
twentyfour.title: Jane!
twentyfour.desc: i wonder which jane they're singing about. clearly a homocidal one
twentyfour.scrolltext: and Jane, you're early / your life's work is dirtied by the fools / who adore you / only to find, only to find you out

twentyfour.link: <iframe src='https://www.youtube.com/embed/TE3_5OmVARM?si=g_D3AYlAjXTdwCtl' title='YouTube video player' frameborder='0' allow='accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share' referrerpolicy='strict-origin-when-cross-origin' allowfullscreen></iframe>
twentyfour.title: take everything, it's all yours
twentyfour.desc: music for floating face down, dead in the ocean on a warm summer's day
twentyfour.scrolltext: kill me slow so you seep into my soul / you can take everything / 'cause it's all yours

twentyfour.title: Losing My CHarm
twentyfour.desc: alas, Draa broke up in 2018. at least they left two versions of this song behind. so long
twentyfour.scrolltext: my fingertips upon your arms / pulling away, losing my charm

twentyfour.title: Ice Melt
twentyfour.desc: sleepy title track, it sounds a little bit like the floor is tilting out from under you
twentyfour.scrolltext: pour the ice melt watch it steam / is it like magic or a dream?

twentyfour.title: Day To Day
twentyfour.desc: calming track, and i love love love the cover art
twentyfour.scrolltext: day to day / same old wave / i′m doing what i want / so, i can't complain

twentyfour.link: <iframe src='https://www.youtube.com/embed/nnzQXFlkQOY?si=xyMgVEFZKqypC4JV' title='YouTube video player' frameborder='0' allow='accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share' referrerpolicy='strict-origin-when-cross-origin' allowfullscreen></iframe>
twentyfour.title: Mirage
twentyfour.desc: daydream caught in a net/web and uploaded to the web/net
twentyfour.scrolltext: in everything i feel my brain's like na / it's not real, it's not real / but it feels real

twentyfour.title: Retreat!
twentyfour.desc: the drums on this got me going crazy ten times out of ten
twentyfour.scrolltext: retreat / losing your speed / return / to the place you were born

twentyfour.title: Oppsie
twentyfour.desc: absolutely obsessed with Good Morning's soft rock, the bass on this song in particular is seared into my brain
twentyfour.scrolltext: it's been a long time coming, it'll be alright / a young boy died turning on the light / did you hear and did you ever see him go? / he's going home but he's still on his own

twentyfour.title: Open My Door
twentyfour.desc: another song i think is better when listened to with the rest of its album, but a good anti-people-pleasing reminder regardless
twentyfour.scrolltext: i used to open my door / to pretty much anyone who was trying to look for / a place to feel safe / but I made my whole world safer for everyone but me

twentyfour.link: <iframe src='https://www.youtube.com/embed/82xcICYq11Y?si=1g0oWeLQJCivzJRm' title='YouTube video player' frameborder='0' allow='accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share' referrerpolicy='strict-origin-when-cross-origin' allowfullscreen></iframe>
twentyfour.title: I'd Like To Walk Around In Your Mind'
twentyfour.desc: it's one of her own favourites and i'd have to agree. the arrangement is beautiful
twentyfour.scrolltext: i'd like to walk around in your mind someday / i'd like to walk all over the things you say to me

twentyfour.title: Crying All the Time
twentyfour.desc: a sweet flytrap tune
twentyfour.scrolltext: he doesn't like it when i cry (cry, cry, cry) / and now he's gone, so i'm crying all the time

twentyfour.title: Hole
twentyfour.desc: i got lost listening to this song after taking a detour walking home on a november evening
twentyfour.scrolltext: and i'd be a lover now if I knew how to dig a hole / throw myself into it / throw myself in it

twentyfour.title: Lonely Boogie
twentyfour.desc: cute and catchy little melody, good for an awkward little dance if you catch yourself listening to it somewhere alone
twentyfour.scrolltext: such a lonely little boogie that’ll last me ‘till the morning / now that nobody’s home and i’m having a good time

twentyfour.title: L-Over
twentyfour.desc: your homunculus-like boyfriend isn't treating you right? make a song about it, it's sure to become one of my favourites of all time
twentyfour.scrolltext: my lover has no heart / magic moving blood around that body / he's cool to the touch / i don't see him much / but when i do, he does nothing for me

twentyfour.title: Afraid
twentyfour.desc: warm little love song. the cowboys on ice skates on the cover are a wonderful bonus and they have my heart
twentyfour.scrolltext: will i do / what i've been afraid to do

twentyfour.link: <iframe src='https://www.youtube.com/embed/vsGc5qJG0RA?si=dWwTlgxSkZLcyIUS' title='YouTube video player' frameborder='0' allow='accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share' referrerpolicy='strict-origin-when-cross-origin' allowfullscreen></iframe>
twentyfour.title: Like That!
twentyfour.desc: another mellow Slater track to skate to at night
twentyfour.scrolltext: yeah, like that!

twentyfour.link: <iframe src='https://www.youtube.com/embed/kzZYQDN0kWQ?si=tJ2id2jx92n0vj0Y' title='YouTube video player' frameborder='0' allow='accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share' referrerpolicy='strict-origin-when-cross-origin' allowfullscreen></iframe>
twentyfour.title: Misery Moon
twentyfour.desc: i listened to this a great deal at the beginning of the year when i was mentally falling apart from stress. it helped me out
twentyfour.scrolltext: misery moon / you knew I was a fool

twentyfour.link: <iframe src='https://www.youtube.com/embed/W5Sq71VTJ9Q?si=jKn_8Jlkzvj_VHm9' title='YouTube video player' frameborder='0' allow='accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share' referrerpolicy='strict-origin-when-cross-origin' allowfullscreen></iframe>
twentyfour.title: The Perfect Girl
twentyfour.desc: can you believe Mareux is american? could have sworn this was eastern european post-punk
twentyfour.scrolltext: you're such a strange girl / the way you look like you do

twentyfour.title: Никто не зовёт меня в гости
twentyfour.desc: honest to god incredible niche synth banger from rostov-on-don
twentyfour.scrolltext: Никто не зовёт меня в гости / Старый мундир испорчен молью

twentyfour.title: Taste
twentyfour.desc: this one is similar to another song ont he album, Touch, i that they're both horny white boy songs of a fashion, this one is just a bit more fraught kind of horny

twentyfour.title: Set the Stage
twentyfour.scrolltext: it's time to set the stage / and there's no time to step away

twentyfour.title: Be My Baby
twentyfour.scrolltext: he says / 'be my baby, let me love you' / you don't know what you're getting into

twentyfour.desc: my opinion (fill in later)

twentyfour.title: ATTENTION POLITICIAN
twentyfour.scrolltext: IT’S SO HARD / TO COME TO / GRIPS LIKE THIS / IF I WANTED TRUTH / THIS LIFE IS IT

twentyfour.title: no bodies
WEIGHTLESS!
U De Mi Or - A COLORS SHOW
Master of None

twentyfour.link: <iframe src='https://www.youtube.com/embed/ej60khe8pzs?si=1-uwTyA6CJ5S1tzQ' title='YouTube video player' frameborder='0' allow='accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share' referrerpolicy='strict-origin-when-cross-origin' allowfullscreen></iframe>
twentyfour.title: Magic Hour
Henry
KATAMARI
RIP tot he Empire State Flea Market
twentyfour.desc: i think i have every single song off this album on this playlist at this point

twentyfour.title: танцевать
twentyfour.scrolltext: Сегодня музыка до утра / Как жаль, что я не умею танцевать

twentyfour.link: <iframe src='https://www.youtube.com/embed/yEP7BzNNO-4?si=uuCp0wWMRRfsHwAy' title='YouTube video player' frameborder='0' allow='accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share' referrerpolicy='strict-origin-when-cross-origin' allowfullscreen></iframe>
twentyfour.title: ESI
